name: ZSNES Slot 4 Saved State File
summary: Learn about .ZS4 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: ZSNES provides numerous save states from 0 to 99 (file extensions .ZS0, .ZS1, .ZS2, and so on).

NOTE: ZSNES save states are not the same as in-game save states. An in-game state may only be created when arriving at specific game milestones whereas ZSNES save states can be created at any time during gameplay.

description: Save state file created by ZSNES, a Super Nintendo Entertainment System (SNES) emulator for PCs; stores a saved game snapshot that can be loaded at another time; used to save and load game progress.
